remarks: Elimination of two conditional operators contained in a wff ` ch ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
statement:
elim2if.1 $e |- ( if ( ph , A , if ( ps , B , C ) ) = A -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
elim2if.2 $e |- ( if ( ph , A , if ( ps , B , C ) ) = B -> ( ch <-> ta ) ) $.
elim2if.3 $e |- ( if ( ph , A , if ( ps , B , C ) ) = C -> ( ch <-> et ) ) $.
elim2if $p |- ( ch <-> ( ( ph /\ th ) \/ ( -. ph /\ ( ( ps /\ ta ) \/ ( -. ps /\ et ) ) ) ) ) $.
